description.en:
HeartK uses the blockchain network and token mechanism to create a perfectly replicated decentralized + NFT + GameFi + meta universe ecosystem for users and developers. Therefore, Hongtao K provides more exclusive functions in terms of ecological service support.

HeartK has a safe and free decentralized trading platform composed of multiple high-performance nodes. The nodes can be expanded and adjusted at any time to provide users with all-weather, real-time, safe and stable free matching transactions or directional transaction services.
